faqs.q: How many calories are in 1 tbsp of ranch dressing?
faqs.a: About 73 kcal per tablespoon of full-fat ranch dressing.

faqs.q: Is ranch dressing high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, 2 tbsp has around 440 mg sodium, so use sparingly if watching salt intake.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in ranch dressing?
faqs.a: Per 2 tbsp: 15.2 g total fat, including 2.4 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Are there low-calorie alternatives to ranch dressing?
faqs.a: Yes, low-fat or yogurt-based versions cut calories by 30-50% per serving.

faqs.q: How does ranch dressing compare to other dressings?
faqs.a: Ranch is calorie-dense due to mayo and cream; vinaigrette is often lighter at ~40-60 kcal per 2 tbsp.
